name: py-pyrosar
description: A framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-progressbar2
dependencies.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3

dependencies.name: py-pathos
dependencies.description: Parallel graph management and execution in heterogeneous computing

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-scoop
dependencies.description:
SCOOP (Scalable COncurrent Operations in Python) is a distributed task
module allowing concurrent parallel programming on various environments,
from heterogeneous grids to supercomputers.

dependencies.name: py-spatialist
dependencies.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: gdal
dependencies.description:
GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) is a translator library for
raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
X/MIT style Open Source license by the Open Source Geospatial
Foundation. As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data
model and vector abstract data model to the calling application for all
supported formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line
utilities for data translation and processing.
